example.prompt:
Create a GitHub pull request with the following details:

Title: Add user authentication with OAuth
Body: This PR implements OAuth authentication using Auth0.

Changes:
- Add Auth0 configuration
- Implement login/logout flows
- Add protected route middleware
- Update tests

Fixes #123

Base branch: main
Head branch: feature/oauth-auth

Use the gh CLI to create the PR and return the result in JSON format.
